## DGraphDotOpts interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DGraphDotOpts<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [attribs](./dgraph-dot.dgraphdotopts.attribs.md) | <code>Partial&lt;GraphAttribs&gt;</code> | Graph visualization attributes. See [GraphAttribs](./dot.graphattribs.md) for details. |
|  [id](./dgraph-dot.dgraphdotopts.id.md) | <code>Fn&lt;T, string&gt;</code> | Required mapping function applied to each node in the dependency graph. Must return a unique ID per node. |
|  [label](./dgraph-dot.dgraphdotopts.label.md) | <code>Fn&lt;T, string&gt;</code> | Optional label function applied to each node to provide a potentially more human readable string than that of <code>id</code>. Not used if <code>spec</code> option is given. |
|  [spec](./dgraph-dot.dgraphdotopts.spec.md) | <code>Fn&lt;T, Partial&lt;Node&gt;&gt;</code> | Optional function applied to each node to provide an object of visualization options. See [Node](./dot.node.md) for details. |
